summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates for and construction of the Northwest Market Street Sewer Separation project - Northwest Market Street from 15th Avenue Northwest to Northwest 54th Street and Northwest 54th Street from Northwest Market Street to 32nd Avenue Northwest, authorizing the employment of consultants, authorizing the acquisition of rights of entry for reconnection of existing side sewers and service drains and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
